Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: Take it from me: I really love making things up, which is why I write fiction for a living

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it difficult to explain, but I'm quite ashamed of being an actress

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not at all fed up with British films, but I am fed up with playing upper-class people

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies make you immortal and ageless

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a long time to appreciate one's parents

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: French culture takes ageing very seriously. There's much less ageism than in Anglo-Saxon countries

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone loves to hate a spin doctor

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: We all come in different shapes and sizes, and that's fine by me

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short to live on low-fat everything

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I think in most jobs, you get better as you get older. You gain experience, you gain knowledge

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to have to be pretty. I don't want to have to be adorable

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all somewhere or the other a little grey, not black and white. We have our imperfections

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an independent woman and a feminist

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: Every thing in life that's first should be a celebration or celebrated with a lot of oomph

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: Destiny plays an important part, but talent and hard work is also important

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am sweet and diplomatic in real life

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a slight tomboyish side to me. But I was studious, and I did not bunk classes!

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: Women simply need to know the right technique of shaving to get the best results

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never do anything that's derogatory to women

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a middle-class family, but we are open-minded people

Quote.Author: Kriti Sanon
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to play a character with grey shades

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: I stay home. It's the best place to be alone. There is hardly any walk-through traffic

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: You can go slow. Allow your dreams and goals to change, but live an intentional life

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still trying to figure out how to have an adult relationship with my parents

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up is successful if they laugh. It's unsuccessful if they don't laugh

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: I just hope that there's a market for somebody who looks like me as the lead of a rom-com, you know?

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a massive rom-com head! Like, every rom-com in the '90s and early 2000s, I've watched

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my favorite comedies is 'Shaun of the Dead.'

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a fish out of water is tough, but that's how you evolve

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of my exposure to American pop culture was through this weird prism of 'Mad' magazine

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents don't really understand my career. They don't really bring it up that much

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't know what bravery is until you overcome fear

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: The singer is always an ambassador of music

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be the jazz singer

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: I've worked with a number of big bands, but there's nothing in life like the Basie band

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: One doesn't have to scat to be a jazz singer

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a goof, man

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: Every record is a gate of a certain kind for me

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes people have this notion that improvisation is simply intuitive leaping into the unknown

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening to something without being present is different from being there in the flesh

Quote.Author: Kurt Elling
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got more low notes than I had when I started

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: I just like playing songs with happy vibes and good feelings

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Coming Over' was probably the fastest collaboration I've ever done

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: When I look for people to work with, I'm just looking for talented people

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: When I am back home, I have an upright piano and I play constantly

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be known simply as a producer who makes music

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: When I make a song, I'm really happy. It's an indescribable feeling

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself more of a producer and a musician than a DJ

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like streaming services. It's a great way for people to find your music

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: I like bringing keyboards and stuff on stage

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: I really do try and play as many festivals as possible

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Every actor wants to be everybody - play all the roles

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Chicago, so I've always been a Bears fan

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Television, cable, features are always out there

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I've stopped racing to get to the red light

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: What I do is not rocket science, but I sure do love it

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not really having a good time, it's not worth it

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Look, isn't there any way you can just stamp me as not crazy and let me get outta here

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: The only reason anyone ever called me a hero is because I get this paper, here

Quote.Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I always treat all the jobs I do as an acting class

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I take, like, 500 selfies to get one I like

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: The more people love you, the more there's going to be people that hate you

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: There are new rumors about me every day

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I get my makeup professionally done, I take a photo

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to inspire my fans to be whoever they want to be, because that's what I've always done

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I honestly hate wearing makeup

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm scared of the day I turn 19. I really don't want to grow past 18

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I wake up every morning with the worst anxiety. I don't know why. I have, like, a problem

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm ready to live on my own. It's a really big step, but I'm ready

Quote.Author: Kylie Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: My fans and followers are so amazing

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: I do quite naughty things now. I do like to be a bit sexy

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had a holiday, and I'd like to take it up professionally

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sure that love exists, even infinite, eternal love

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of me is a sexual exhibitionist

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: This is such a special summer holiday for me. I haven't known myself so relaxed in years

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: I just can't help but see things differently

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: Gay icons usually have some tragedy in their lives, but I've only had tragic haircuts and outfits

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: I am really not looking further than my next trip. I'm enjoying being in the moment

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very proud Australian, always bragging about our country wherever I am in the world

Quote.Author: Kylie Minogue
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no shortcut to learning a craft; you just have to put the years in

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the gym; I love basketball. I'm really passionate about it

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to keep the defense guessing

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I command is respect

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: All I do is sit at home and watch Netflix

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody in the NBA is good. And then you have the really good ones and the great ones

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: My focus is basketball, and that's it

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: When it applies to the Olympics and making a decision, I have to claim Australia as my country

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be on the cover of 'GQ.' That's a personal goal

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: Multiple Bentleys isn't making anyone 'financially set.'

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: Guys like Josh Gordon need to stay in his sport and mind his own business

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Luxury is a state of mind

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: There's lots of things you pull out lipstick for

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Guys understand a waistline. They understand a silhouette

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Guys understand a waistline. They understand a silhouette. I dress for men

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Random things are luxurious to people. It's personal

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Peruvian food is so simple yet amazingly flavored with their traditional spices

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I love a real-life, movie moment in living color

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has their own special set of problems - in their own minds

Quote.Author: L'Wren Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: People often try to disguise televisions. I always think that makes it worse. It is what it is!

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Lincoln emancipated nobody. The man freed not a single slave

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, human civilization is drowning in a sea of lies

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: As to the media, they are protected by the First Amendment, as they should be

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of being considered property

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Collective states are constitutionally incapable of reliably producing anything but corpses

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll remind you all, however, that for government, existence is a privilege, not a right

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: City governments ought to be abolished, if only as a public health measure

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of living in a police state

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm as radical as libertarians come

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Government is waging war against the people

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether I'm wearing lots of makeup or no makeup, I'm always the same person inside

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Born this Way' is about being yourself, and loving who you are and being proud

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm perpetually lonely

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't say that I am one of the greatest dancers, but I am really quite good at what I do

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: In a sense I portray myself in a very androgynous way, and I love androgyny

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to make money; I want to make a difference

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: Being beautiful is not so fun when you're in a business with all men

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I live halfway between reality and theater at all times. And I was born this way

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I am my own sanctuary and I can be reborn as many times as I choose throughout my life

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I like pushing boundaries

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Authenticity is very important - be true to one's self

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that the greatest lesson I learned from my father is just having compassion towards people

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to play by my own rules

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Focus on being balanced - success is balance

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to fight for your health and stay on top of it. Our bodies are meant to be healthy

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to encourage women to take control of their health

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who's seen me before knows that when it's fight time, I don't have much to say

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I never intended to box forever, and always planned to move on to do other things

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really try to tell people whether they should fight. It's definitely not for everybody

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody wants recognition, but we can't all get it

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: Now that I am a deputy, I will cease to be an agitator

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: My nomination to be Governor was not to gratify ambition

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: You must be a power on earth, and must therefore accept all the consequences of this position

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: The principle of evil in Europe is the enervating spirit of Russian absolutism

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: The unspoken word never does harm

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: In exile, I have tried to profit by the past and prepare for the future

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: Neutrality, as a lasting principle, is an evidence of weakness

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: I can understand Communism, but not Socialism

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: Yet my humble capacity has not preserved me from calumnies

Quote.Author: Lajos Kossuth
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to thank the People, the Congress, and the Government of the United States for my liberation

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is inspired by youth and nostalgia and draws inspiration from the best of the past

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of the time when I write about the person that I love, I feel like I'm writing about New York

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been writing since I was really young, so I considered myself a writer for a really long time

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are born an artist, you have no choice but to fight to stay an artist

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: There's backlash about everything I do

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: My music is a luxury

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: When I walk outside, people have something to say about it

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a writer first and a singer second

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm personally more struck by visual things more than musical

Quote.Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote.QuoteValue: Seeing myself on the screen makes me cringe. I understand that I am that way - pouty

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: A gentleman is simply a patient wolf

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so gullible. I'm so damn gullible. And I am so sick of me being gullible

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is, sex doesn't mean that much to me now

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I started off wanting one husband and seven children, but it ended up the other way around

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: It used to be that when an actress reached thirty, she was considered almost washed up

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather lose a good earring than be caught without make-up

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: My life has been a series of emergencies

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved a challenge

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: Some day... some day, I want to go much deeper into the human mind

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always nervous when I start a new picture

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: If you worried about falling off the bike, you'd never get on

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: There comes a point in every man's life when he has to say: 'Enough is enough.'

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody needs to cry for me. I'm going to be great

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning is about heart, not just legs. It's got to be in the right place

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: The riskiest thing you can do is get greedy

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: It can't be any simpler: the farewell is going to be on the Champs-Elysees

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: I figure the faster I pedal, the faster I can retire

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to win. I'll never win again. I may have to take up golf - take on Tiger

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: If we don't somehow stem the tide of childhood obesity, we're going to have a huge problem

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps the mission of an artist is to interpret beauty to people - the beauty within themselves

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: What happens to a dream deferred? Does it dry up Like a raisin in the sun? Or does it explode?

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: When peoples care for you and cry for you, they can straighten out your soul

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: My soul has grown deep like the rivers

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I swear to the Lord, I still can't see, why Democracy means, everybody but me

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: It's such a Bore Being always Poor

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I will not take 'but' for an answer

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of dieting, then I eat pizza

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I can have an androgynous quality

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: What should all men know about women? That we are always right and you should just agree

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Being sexy is something inside, and not everybody has it

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I like spending time with my husband

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not like I'm sitting at home coming up with some secret beauty plan

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Going to rehab was the best decision I ever made

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think men look best when they're dressed in something that makes them feel comfortable

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: When it's colder, your skin needs more attention

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people like it when you have a bit of personality

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter who scores the points, it's who can get the ball to the scorer

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got a theory that if you give 100% all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: What's better? Dogs or broomsticks? I mean will the world really ever know?

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, the greatest athletes in the world are African-American

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: But it is a black man's game, and it will be forever

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: The best player I ever played with was Dennis Johnson

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you are labeled 'the best' you want to stay up there, and you can't do it by loafing around

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: I get homesick

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: When it gets down to it, basketball is basketball

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: When you innovate, you've got to be prepared for everyone telling you you're nuts

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had all of the disadvantages required for success

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: It's Microsoft versus mankind, with Microsoft having only a slight lead

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Bill Gates is the pope of the personal computer industry. He decides who's going to build

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Autonomy was shopped to us. We looked at the price and thought it was absurdly high

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: We think a modern cloud lets you decide when you want to upgrade. We don't decide for you

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Maui reminded me of San Diego: beautiful, but crowded

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Taking care of your employees is extremely important and very, very visible

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: The social network is the paradigm of the modern service application

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe people have to follow their dreams - I did

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: School after Labor Day is now the law of the land in Maryland

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Crime is out of control in Baltimore City

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: You can disagree without being disagreeable. That's always been my mantra

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's set aside political gamesmanship and work together for the sake of our children

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty plain-spoken guy

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to roll back anything. Nothing is going to change with respect to reproductive rights

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never supported one penny of tuition increases

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have nothing to do with Donald Trump

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a Trump fan. I don't think he should be the nominee

Quote.Author: Larry Hogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had completely gray hair since, like, 30

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: It's joyful to give. But for people who want to take advantage of you, you're kind of an easy mark

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love asking questions. I love people. It's in my DNA. I'm cursed - and blessed

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the worst person to be stuck with in a traffic jam

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: If I do something caring for a friend, I have no doubt in my mind they would do it for me

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to put a stake in people, because I know people helped me

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: People would pay money to work at CNN

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sort of the comic relief after a hard day at work. My message is that it's OK to relax

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from Brooklyn. In Brooklyn, if you say, 'I'm dangerous', you'd better be dangerous

Quote.Author: Larry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm 80 years old, and I don't know what I'm going to be when I grow up

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything starts as somebody's daydream

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: The dinosaurs became extinct because they didn't have a space program

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: Building one space station for everyone was and is insane: we should have built a dozen

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd repair our education system or replace it with something that works

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent a lot of my life among people brighter than myself

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: We're looking as far ahead as we can, and we don't get penalized for mistakes

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: We should not have assumed that a political space station could be built

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got five or six unpublished stories kicking around looking for somebody to buy them

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: My problem with new writers is that it takes me five or six years to memorise the right names

Quote.Author: Larry Niven
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a strong interest in history

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: The last thing I would ever do is try to become a network programmer

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I'd say what's bad for the country is good for my business, unfortunately

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: I would consider myself more a passionate centrist

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the type of person to have a schadenfreude

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take pleasure in anyone's demise, really

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I'm successful, and sometimes I'm not, but I don't mind going down trying

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: In my career, I'm always trying to do something different

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I hadn't counted on 'The Unblackening' happening to my time slot as well

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore
Quote.QuoteValue: In my time, I experienced a black man not being able to be the quarterback of a football team
